item.title: 莫雷纳誓言不急于司法改革，墨西哥比索反弹
item.description: 墨西哥比索从近两年的低点反弹，因为下议院执政党即将上任的领导人表示，国会不会匆忙通过一项有争议的改革国家司法机构的提案。【原文：The Mexican peso rebounded from an almost two-year low after the incoming leader of the ruling party in the lower house said a controversial proposal to overhaul the country’s judiciary won’t be rushed by congress.】

item.title: 房地产下滑加剧，瑞银下调中国经济增长预期
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）下调了对中国今明两年经济增长的预期，理由是房地产市场的低迷尚未见底，程度超出预期。【原文：UBS Group AG downgraded its forecast for China’s growth for this year and the next, citing a deeper-than-expected property market slump that’s yet to see a bottom.】

item.title: 基本金属在需求担忧和美联储利率不确定性中回落
item.description: 在美元走强、需求担忧挥之不去以及美联储宽松货币政策路径不确定的情况下，基本金属止跌反弹。【原文：Base metals snapped their rallies amid a strong dollar, lingering demand worries and uncertainty about the Federal Reserve’s monetary easing path.】

item.title: 阿联酋石油服务供应商计划今年进行该国最大规模的首次公开募股
item.description: NMDC 集团是一家主要为能源行业提供建筑和疏浚服务的公司，该公司正计划在今年进行阿拉伯联合酋长国规模最大的首次公开募股。【原文：NMDC Group, a provider of construction and dredging services mainly to the energy industry, is planning what would be the United Arab Emirates’ biggest initial public offering this year.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织团队将于下周访问乌克兰进行预算和贷款审查
item.description: 国际货币基金组织将于下周与乌克兰官员会面，审查这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的预算前景，并决定是否从 156 亿美元的援助计划中再拨付 11 亿美元。【原文：The International Monetary Fund will meet with Ukrainian officials next week to review the war-torn country’s budget outlook and decide whether to disburse the next $1.1 billion from a $15.6 billion aid program.】

item.title: NFT Marketplace OpenSea 收到美国证券交易委员会的执法行动警告
item.description: 不可兑换代币市场 OpenSea 表示已收到美国证券交易委员会的 Wells 通知，表明监管机构有意起诉该公司。【原文：Nonfungible token marketplace OpenSea said it has received a Wells Notice from the US Securities and Exchange Commission, indicating the regulator’s intention to sue the company.】

item.title: 乌克兰债券持有人批准 200 亿美元债务重组
item.description: 乌克兰的海外私人债务重组得到了债券持有人的广泛支持，使该国获得了急需的债务减免，为抵御俄罗斯的侵略提供了资金。【原文：Ukraine received widespread bondholder support to restructure its overseas private debt, allowing the nation to secure much-needed debt relief to finance its defense against Russian aggression.】

item.title: 西方石油公司石油交易的影响使 Ecopetrol 失去两名董事会成员
item.description: Ecopetrol SA 公司决定退出以 36 亿美元从西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum Corp.【原文：Two members of Ecopetrol SA’s board quit following the company’s decision to pull out of a $3.6 billion deal to buy a stake in Texas shale-oil assets from Occidental Petroleum Corp.】

item.title: 卡塔尔据称是俄罗斯德国石油公司资产的最后竞标者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，卡塔尔是俄罗斯国有石油公司 Rosneft PJSC 在德国的业务最后一个竞标者。【原文：Qatar is the last remaining bidder for the seized German operations of Russia’s state-controlled oil company Rosneft PJSC, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 遭到强烈反对后，美国证券交易委员会放弃共同基金 "摇摆定价 "授权
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会已经放弃了一项计划，该计划原本会迫使许多共同基金彻底改革其定价模式。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission has retreated from a plan that would have forced many mutual funds to overhaul their pricing models.】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔哈撒韦公司市值突破 1 万亿美元
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. became the first US company outside of the tech sector to surpass $1 trillion in market value.】

item.title: Birkenstock 股价飙升，盈利出错的可能性微乎其微
item.description: 随着 Birkenstock Holding Plc 股价自 15 亿美元首次公开募股以来上涨了约三分之一，这家矫形鞋公司在周四公布财报时的压力也随之而来。【原文：With shares of Birkenstock Holding Plc gaining about a third since its $1.5 billion initial public offering, the pressure is on for the orthopedic shoe company to deliver when it reports earnings Thursday.】

item.title: 莲花汽车因中国产电动汽车关税问题削减交付目标
item.description: 由中国吉利控股的电动汽车制造商莲花技术公司（Lotus Technology Inc.【原文：Lotus Technology Inc., the electric-car maker majority-owned by China’s Geely, has slashed its annual delivery target by more than half amid trade uncertainties and tariffs on Chinese-made EVs.】

item.title: 劳资纠纷后加拿大列车运行接近正常
item.description: 据实时铁路数据提供商 RailState 称，加拿大国家铁路公司（Canadian National Railway Co.【原文：Train movements at Canadian National Railway Co. and Canadian Pacific Kansas City Ltd. are almost back to normal after a short lockout of unionized workers, according to RailState, a provider of real-time rail data.】

item.title: 不确定性笼罩财政政策，以色列银行维持利率不变
item.description: 以色列央行维持利率不变，在财政政策不确定的情况下，寻求平衡通胀上升和增长疲软的影响。【原文：Israel’s central bank left interest rates unchanged, seeking to balance the impact of rising inflation against weak growth as uncertainty surrounds fiscal policy.】

item.title: 日内瓦一对夫妇因 18 亿美元的 1MDB 欺诈案被瑞士定罪
item.description: 一对日内瓦商人因参与诈骗马来西亚 1MDB 经济发展基金的 18 亿美元骗局而被瑞士法院判定犯有欺诈罪。【原文：A pair of Geneva businessmen were found guilty of fraud by a Swiss court for their roles in a $1.8 billion scam to defraud Malaysia’s 1MDB economic development fund.】

item.title: 暴利税转折令市值 210 亿美元的电力生产商 CEZ 股价飙升
item.description: 捷克共和国最大的电力公司 CEZ AS 的股价跌至近四个月来的最低水平，原因是围绕这家国有控股公司的政治操纵仍在继续。【原文：Shares in the Czech Republic’s dominant power utility CEZ AS dropped to the lowest level in almost four months, pulled down by continued political maneuvering around the state-controlled company.】

item.title: 战争经济拉动需求，俄罗斯钢铁抵御全球经济衰退
item.description: 中国需求疲软压制了全球钢铁市场，但弗拉基米尔-普京的战争经济使俄罗斯成为一个引人注目的例外。【原文：Weak Chinese demand is depressing the global steel market, but Vladimir Putin’s war economy has made Russia a striking exception.】

item.title: 期权指向 "像沙滩球一样 "的市场涨势
item.description: 股票期权交易表明，投资者正在为 8 月份的震荡后的收益做准备。【原文：Trading in stock options shows that investors are positioning for gains following the August wobble.】

item.title: 巴西作物数据好于预期，白糖止跌反弹
item.description: 原糖期货在纽约回落，原因是世界第一大出口国巴西的生产商报告称，正在进行的收割工作取得了好于预期的成果。【原文：Raw sugar futures retreated in New York as producers in the world’s top exporter Brazil reported better-than-expected results for the ongoing harvest.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司称监管机构的削减建议令其失去投资价值
item.description: 英国最大的供水和污水处理服务提供商表示，除非监管机构允许更高的回报率和更高的账单涨幅，否则它将无法吸引到维持运营所需的新资金。【原文：The UK’s biggest water and sewage-services provider said it would be unable to attract the new equity it needs to stay afloat unless the regulator allows fatter returns and higher bill hikes.】

item.title: 欧佩克+决定临近，石油市场警告不断增加
item.description:
分析师认为生产商在今年晚些时候增加桶数的空间有限。【原文：

Analysts see only limited scope for producers to add barrels later this year.

】

item.title: 江西铜业未摆脱矿石短缺对收费的冲击
item.description: 中国江西铜业公司预计，全球矿石短缺将持续到下半年，从而给加工费带来下行压力。【原文：China’s Jiangxi Copper Co. expects a global shortage of ore to extend into the second half, keeping downward pressure on processing fees.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率再次降至 2023 年 4 月以来最低水平
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率上周再次降至 2023 年 4 月以来的最低水平，刺激了购房申请的小幅回升。【原文：US mortgage rates fell again last week to the lowest level since April 2023, spurring a modest pickup in applications to buy a home.】

item.title: Adnoc 完成对价值 120 亿欧元的 Covestro 交易的尽职调查
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. has largely completed due diligence on its planned bid for German chemical company Covestro AG, paving the way for the state-owned energy firm’s biggest-ever deal, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 英伟达财报将考验 S&P 500 指数 4 万亿美元的复苏能力
item.description: 自 ChatGPT 发布以来的近两年时间里，Nvidia 公司股价上涨了近 3 万亿美元，几乎重创了美国股市，使这家人工智能芯片制造巨头对众多股票指数产生了巨大影响。【原文：The almost $3 trillion rally in Nvidia Corp. shares over the roughly two years since ChatGPT’s unveiling has virtually rewired the US stock market, giving the artificial intelligence chipmaking giant an outsized influence on a bevy of equity indexes.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。英伟达（Nvidia）在周三财报发布前左右着市场的命运，土耳其里拉的神秘下跌也让投资者挠头。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Nvidia is carrying the fortunes of markets before its earnings on Wednesday, and a mystery fall in the Turkish lira has investors scratching their heads. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 哈西娜下台后孟加拉国解除对伊斯兰党的禁令
item.description: 孟加拉国临时政府撤销了对该国最大伊斯兰党派伊斯兰大会党的禁令，推翻了前总理谢赫-哈西娜政权的决定。【原文：Bangladesh’s interim government withdrew a ban on the country’s largest Islamist party Jamaat-e-Islami, reversing a decision by former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina’s regime.】

item.title: 炼油忧虑削弱中国石油上游利润
item.description: 中国顶尖的石油和天然气公司从开采化石燃料中获得了丰厚的利润，但在加工和销售过程中，情况却截然不同。【原文：China’s top oil and gas companies are getting outsized profits from drilling fossil fuels, but it’s a different story when it comes to processing their haul and selling it.】

item.title: 去年清洁能源工作岗位的增长速度是美国总体工作岗位增长速度的两倍
item.description:
该国在电动汽车和电池制造、可再生能源及相关行业新增就业岗位142,00个，占能源行业新增就业岗位的一半以上。【原文：

The country added 142,00 jobs in EV and battery manufacturing, renewables and related sectors, amounting to more than half of new employment in the energy industry. 

】
